publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7604.2 John Swinney: Winter Resilienceâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7604) in the name of Andy Kerr, insert at end ", and acknowledges the significant efforts made by a wide range of public service workers, voluntary organisations and people across Scotland to maintain essential services, support their neighbours and keep communities moving through the extreme conditions." Supported by: Keith Brown*
